name: Eekeemoo - Splinters of the Dark Shard
description: In this awesome third person adventure game you will help Eekeemoo rescue his friends from the clutches of the evil Dark Shard! Your quest will take you deep into the Dark Shards four corrupted splinter worlds.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7.0 Processor: Core i3 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Radeon HD6870 with 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 700 MB available space
